name: iocleubd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1)))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1)))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cioc, c1)))

comment: An element of a left-open right-closed interval is smaller than or equal to its upper bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
